weka.distributed.spark

Class SparkJob.NoKeyTextOutputFormat<K,V>

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.apache.hadoop.mapreduce.OutputFormat<K,V>
      • org.apache.hadoop.mapreduce.lib.output.FileOutputFormat<K,V>
        • org.apache.hadoop.mapreduce.lib.output.TextOutputFormat<K,V>
          • weka.distributed.spark.SparkJob.NoKeyTextOutputFormat<K,V>
  • Type Parameters:
    K - Key type
    V - Value type
    Enclosing class:
    SparkJob

    public static class SparkJob.NoKeyTextOutputFormat<K,V>
extends org.apache.hadoop.mapreduce.lib.output.TextOutputFormat<K,V>
    Subclass of TextOutputFormat that does not write the key. We need this as PairRDDFunctions.saveAsNewAPIHadoopFile() does not wrap its key/values in org.apache.hadoop.io.* classes, so specifying a NullWritable for the key does not suppress the key.
    Author:
    Mark Hall (mhall{[at]}pentaho{[dot]}com)
